ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Beards Retextured + Stubbly Facial Hair
ModMetaData.author: Rohzdear
ModMetaData.description: A retexture of Stubbly Facial Hair using the textures from Vanilla Beards Retextured kitbashed together. Use alongside the original Vanilla Beards Retextured to make the vanilla beards look just as good. Vanilla Pawns Retextured is not required, but the new beard textures will fit best alongside it.
